Please sign-in to your account and start: Please sign-in to your account and start the adventure
Enter your email and we'll send you inst: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
Password reset email sent! Please check: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
Please check your inbox for a reset link: Please check your inbox for a reset link and click it to update your password. Don't forget to check your spam or junk folder as well.
Failed to send reset email. Please try a: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
Your account has been disabled. Please c: Your account has been disabled. Please contact support.
The Email field must be a valid email: The Email field must be a valid email
Field must contain at least one uppercas: Field must contain at least one uppercase, lowercase, special character and digit with min 8 chars
The Confirm Password field confirmation: The Confirm Password field confirmation does not match
Email rate limit exceeded: Too many requests. Please try again later.
Network error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

importPropertyDialog.title: Import Properties
importPropertyDialog.subtitle: Upload a CSV file to bulk import properties

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Download the CSV template to see the required format
instructions.step2: Fill in the property details (ID is optional)
instructions.step4: Save the file and upload it below
instructions.step5: Existing properties (by ID) will be updated, new ones will be created

upload.dropOrClick: Drop CSV file here or click to browse

preview.reviewData: Review the data below and click "Confirm Import" to proceed.

duplicates.message: {count} property(ies) already exist and will be skipped.
duplicates.nameCommunityExists: Property with same name exists in this community

importUserDialog.title: Import Users
importUserDialog.subtitle: Upload a CSV file to bulk import users

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Download the CSV template to see the required format
instructions.step2: Fill in the user details (email, display_name, password, role are required)
instructions.step3: Password must be at least 8 characters
instructions.step5: Users will be created with the password provided in the CSV

upload.dropOrClick: Drop CSV file here or click to browse

preview.reviewData: Review the data below and click "Confirm Import" to proceed.

duplicates.message: {count} user(s) already exist and will be skipped.

errors.roleHierarchyMessage: {count} user(s) have roles above your permission level ({role}). These users will be skipped.
errors.cannotCreateRole: You cannot create users with this role
errors.invalidIdsNote: Users will still be imported, but these IDs will be skipped.
errors.communityNotFound: Community ID not found in database
errors.propertyNotFound: Property ID not found in database
errors.unauthorizedCommunityMessage: {count} user(s) are assigned to communities you don't have access to. These users will be skipped.
errors.unauthorizedCommunity: You don't have permission to create users in this community

fields.authKeyProtectedHint: Auth key is protected. Click eye to reveal partial key.
